ygData.subject: RE: Philosophy behind the Bard class
ygData.msgSnippet: good idea, and in keeping with our many enchanter-like songs.  of course, as you may already know, for mobs under level 38 our charm song is also a memory blur
ygData.messageBody:
good idea, and in keeping with our many enchanter-like songs. of course, as
you may already know, for mobs under level 38 our charm song is also a
memory blur in a sense. it will reset the damage meter, though keep the mob
quite aggro'd on you. a full mem blur to erase damage and aggro would be
nice. level 39 has an open song slot i hear =)

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server



> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> I'd like to see a bind song! hahaha, just kidding.
> What I'd really like to see is a memory blur song.
>
>
> Elwyn Heartstring
> Level 50 Bard
> Erollisi Marr
